cucumber.api

Interface Plugin

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ColorAware, ConcurrentEventListener, EventListener, Formatter, StepDefinitionReporter, StrictAware, SummaryPrinter

    public interface Plugin
    Marker interface for all plugins.

    A plugin can be added to the runtime to listen in on step definition, summary printing and test execution.

    Plugins are added to the runtime from the command line or @CucumberOptions and may be provided with a parameter. To accept this parameter the plugin must have a public constructor that accepts one of the following arguments:

    • String
    • Appendable
    • URI
    • URL
    • File

    To make the parameter optional the plugin must also have a public default constructor.

    Plugins may also implement one of these interfaces:

    • ColorAware
    • StrictAware
    • EventListener
    • ConcurrentEventListener
    • StepDefinitionReporter
    • SummaryPrinter
